ygData.subject: Re: Is the verdict finally in?
ygData.msgSnippet: acctually...you can get good stuff and not be twinked.  I had a gnome that got to lvl 6 or 7 (I think) did a lot of fishing, paid for brewing, used that to
ygData.messageBody:
acctually...you can get good stuff and not be twinked. I had a gnome that
got to lvl 6 or 7 (I think) did a lot of fishing, paid for brewing, used
that to master pottery and did that (this is back when they worked to get
money from NPCs) and was able to buy lotsa good stuff that ppl lvls 18-20
wanted.

anyway, it took a loot of time and it was boreing and I gave up the
character cause everyone called me a twinker (grrr).

well, I guess a lvl 1 might be able to do the same some other way, but I
doubt it.

Omeg
